author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sunflower Pharmaceutical Group says dividend payment date on April 18
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Sunflower Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 10 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 17
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 18 and the dividend will be paid on April 18
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/awMMb6
